articles.title: Greetings to Polish PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Polish PM
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a congratulatory message to Ewa Kopacz upon her appointment as prime minister of the Republic of Poland on Oct. 9.
					 The message wished the prime minister and government of Poland successes in their work for the country's development and prosperity.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a congratulatory message to Grzegorz Schetyna upon his appointment as foreign minister of the Republic of Poland on Oct. 9.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Urged Not to Chill Atmosphere of Improving Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Urged Not to Chill Atmosphere of Improving Inter-Korean Relations 
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye, chief executive of south Korea, when meeting the secretary general of ASEAN  Wednesday, let loose such invectives as "double-attitude of provocation and appeasement" and "call for abandonment of nuclear program," again pulling up the DPRK over its  "nuclear issue". 
					 The spokesman for the National Reconciliation Council issued a statement on Friday blasting her reckless remarks. This is an unpardonable politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK and indecorum chilling the hard-won atmosphere of improving the north-south relations, the statement said, and went on: 
					
					 It is most important for mending the north-south relations to create a good atmosphere and both sides should work hard to do so. 
					
					 The north and the south have already agreed to have the second round of high-level contact. 
					
					 However, Park made such coarse invectives against the DPRK before having the contact. This is the behavior bereft of elementary courtesy and common sense towards the dialogue partner. 
					
					 No matter what pressure her U.S. master may put on Park, she should learn how to recognize and respect the dialogue partner before reading his face. 
					
					 Vitriol against the dialogue partner would only hurt mutual feelings and bring nothing good to both. 
					
					 By letting loose again such reckless remarks against the DPRK Park brought to light the fact that "improvement of the north-south relations" and "unification" touted by her a lot were not utterances made out of her concern for them but to improve her image. 
					
					 In the past too, she let loose a string of invectives rattling the nerves of the DPRK irrespective of time and place, bedeviling the north-south relations. 
					
					 She would be well advised to behave herself, bearing in mind that a golden chance of improving the strained north-south relations may be missed.

articles.title: Memorandum on Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Feats for National Reunification
articles.content:
Memorandum on Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Feats for National Reunification
						
 Pyongyang October 10 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee for the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea made public a memorandum on the feats for national reunification performed by the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu on Friday, the 34th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK) by President Kim Il Sung at the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 From the first day of the country's division Kim Il Sung set it as the supreme task of the nation to reunify the country and consistently adhered to the line of one Korea, the line for reunification. He put forward the proposal for founding the DFRK, the most realistic one suited to the desire of all Koreans for reunification and the specific conditions of Korea, and brightly indicated the way of national reunification, the memorandum said, and went on:
					
					 He advanced the DFRK proposal on October 10, Juche 69 (1980).
					
					 According to the proposal for founding the DFRK, the country should be reunified by founding a Federal Republic through the establishment of a unified national government on the condition that the north and the south recognize and tolerate each other's ideas and social systems, a government in which the two sides are represented on an equal footing and under which they exercise regional autonomy with equal rights and duties.
					
					 The proposal comprehensively indicates the issue of founding a reunified country including the principle and ways of building a federal state, nature and function of a federal state and duties of a unified government and regional governments and their co-relations.
					
					 The best way of reunifying the country as soon as possible is to found a reunified country through federal formula based on one nation and one state, two systems and two governments.
					
					 No sooner had the proposal been published than it aroused full support and approval of all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad and the international community.
					
					 Kim Il Sung wisely led the struggle to carry out the proposal.
					
					 In his famous work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" in April, 1993, he clearly clarified once again that a pan-national reunified state should be built to represent all members of the nation irrespective of party and group affiliation and strata, leaving the two systems and two governments in the north and the south as intact.
					
					 He worked heart and soul to provide internal and external circumstances favorable for realizing the reunification through federal formula till the last moments of his great life.
					
					 The memorandum said that leader Kim Jong Il powerfully aroused all Koreans to realizing the cause of national reunification. It continued:
					
					 He published his work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" on August 4, 1997, formulated the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme for the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the DFRK advanced by Kim Il Sung as the three charters for national reunification which integrally systematize and consummate the fundamental principle and ways of national reunification and clearly indicated the issues arising in carrying out the proposal for reunification through federal formula.
					
					 In 2000, in which fell the 20th anniversary of the proposal for founding the DFRK, he provided the north-south summit for the first time in the history of national division and brought about the June 15 joint declaration, the landmark for national reunification in the new century, to Koreans, an event to be specially recorded in national history.
					
					 He powerfully aroused the whole nation to the struggle to implement the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 He provided again the historic north-south summit in Pyongyang in October 2007 and performed undying feats by making sure that "the Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity", the programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, was published.
					
					 The memorandum said that the cause of national reunification is greeting a new epochal phase thanks to the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, adding:
					
					 In the New Year Address he clarified the principled stand of the DPRK to make a new advance in the movement for national reunification true to the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il this year marking the 20th anniversary of the last autographs left by Kim Il Sung on the historic document on national reunification, and the ways for carrying out it.
					
					 The north and the south, in the June 15 joint declaration, recognized that there is commonness in the north-proposed low-level federation and the south-proposed confederation for national reunification and agreed to work for reunification in this direction. The south Korean authorities should respect the joint declaration, work hard to carry it out and thus positively respond to the aspiration of all Koreans for reconciliation, unity and peaceful reunification.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Nepali Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Nepali Party Leader
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from K. P. Sharma Oli, chairman of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist), on October 6.
					 The message said he deems it an honor to extend warm congratulations and best wishes to His Excellency Kim Jong Un on behalf of the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist) and on his own behalf on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It said, availing himself of the opportunity, he  recollected the election of Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the WPK on October 8, 1997, 17 years ago, and his reelection as general secretary of the WPK at the historic Conference of the WPK on September 28, 2010.
					
					 The WPK is registering great achievements under the wise and energetic leadership of Kim Jong Un, the message noted.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un greater successes in leading the sacred struggle of the Korean people to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea and build the DPRK into a thriving socialist country prospering in the world in the future.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness, expressing conviction that the friendly relations between the two parties will grow stronger.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization, on October 10.
					 In the message the president said he was pleased to extend the sincere and warmest congratulations and best wishes to His Excellency Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the friendly Korean people on behalf of the State of Palestine and its people and on his own behalf on the founding anniversary of the friendly Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Kim Jong Un has realized the aim and aspiration of the friendly country and people of the DPRK, the message said.
					
					 It expressed thanks to Kim Jong Un for paying attention to realizing the just cause of Palestine to end occupation and build an independent state with east Kuds as its capital city, a peaceful and stable country keeping good neighborly relations with its surrounding countries, and for always supporting and extending solidarity to its just cause in international arenas.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and hoped that the historical relations of friendship and solidarity between the two countries and peoples would grow stronger.

articles.title: DPRK FM Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK FM Back Home
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong and his party returned home from visiting Russia on Friday.
					 Earlier, they visited Sakhalin Region of Russia and had a talk with the acting governor of the region. They also toured a seafood processing factory and other places.

articles.title: Senior Party, State, Army Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Senior Party, State, Army Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Senior party, state and army officials visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Friday, the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The visitors included Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Hwang Pyong So and leading officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party and officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Laid before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 A floral basket was laid before the statues in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the WPK Central Military Commission, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state, the visitors made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are preserved and the halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Visit Party Founding Museum
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Visit Party Founding Museum
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Leading officials of the party and state visited the Party Founding Museum on Friday, the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 In the museum there are offices where President Kim Il Sung worked and a reception room and a conference hall where the Third Enlarged Executive Committee Meeting of the Central Organizing Committee of the Communist Party of North Korea and many other meetings were held.
					
					 There are also a lodging house he used after his return home, a pond, and a monument to party founding which conveys the cause of party building.
					
					 The visitors went round revolutionary historic relics and materials showing the undying feats of the President.
					
					 They recalled those days of history with deep emotion, being briefed on the fact that he worked heart and soul to found the party right after the liberation of the country and strengthen it into the staff of the revolution.
					
					 Among the visitors were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other leading officials of the party and state, the chairperson of a friendly party and officials of the party and power bodies, Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Seen before the statues on Mansu Hill was a floral basket from Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the name of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, industrial establishments, farms and schools in Pyongyang. Bouquets and flowers were also laid before the statues.
					
					 The Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front also placed a floral basket before the statues.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the statues.
					
					 Placed before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, the Mansudae Art Studio and portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in various places in Pyongyang were floral baskets in the name of units of the People's Army, institutions and enterprises, bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Servicepersons, working people, school youth and children across the country visited the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and mosaics depicting smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in their residential areas.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of WPK Celebrated in DPRK
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of WPK Celebrated in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Art performances were given in Pyongyang and local areas to celebrate the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 At a concert "Fly High, Our Party Flag" given at the Moranbong Theater in Pyongyang the artistes of the National Symphony Orchestra put on the stage orchestras "General on a Galloping White Horse", "Thinking of General", violin duet "Voice of My Heart" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying feats the peerless great persons performed by leading the party building and the absolute trust in the great party.
					
					 A song and dance performance was given by the Mansudae Art Troupe at the East Pyongyang Grand Theater and revolutionary drama "A Letter from a Daughter" at the National Theatre.
					
					 An acrobatic performance was given by the National Circus at the Pyongyang Circus Theater.
					
					 Art performances were given across the country.
					
					 Artistes of North Hwanghae, Jagang, Kangwon and South Hamgyong provinces gave performances high in ideological value and artistry, instilling into people of the provinces the conviction that the eternal happiness of the people is guaranteed and a rosy future is promised thanks to the care of the mother party.

articles.title: Art Performance Given to Mark Founding Anniversary of WPK
articles.content:
Art Performance Given to Mark Founding Anniversary of WPK
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- There took place an art performance by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League at the plaza of the Monument to Party Founding to mark the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Put on the stage were small choruses "Fly High, Our Party Flag" and "Young People, Be Loyal to Our Party", narration and female solo "We Sing of the Party" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who strengthened the WPK into the most authoritative, dignified and invincible party in the era of independence.
					
					 The audience were mesmerized by mixed chorus and oungum solo "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass" and other numbers which praised the stirring reality of the DPRK.
					
					 In male quartet "Joy of the People," male solo "Expression of My Inmost Feelings" and other numbers the performers depicted the great honor and happiness of the young vanguard in the era of Songun who are leading a worthwhile life, being blessed by the illustrious leaders and the party as they have Marshal Kim Jong Un at the head of the WPK and the revolution.
					
					 The performance ended with small choruses "Our Leader Loved by People" and "Glory to Our Great Party" reflecting the indomitable spirit and revolutionary enthusiasm of the young vanguard.
					
					 Among the audience were officials of the youth league and youth and students in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- There took place dancing parties of youth and students in various parts on Friday, the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Dancing parties started to the tune of the song "Glory to Our Great Party" in such venues here as the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and the Arch of Triumph.
					
					 The participants danced, recollecting the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung performed in party building.
					
					 Resounded forth at the dancing plazas were songs reflecting the enthusiasm of the young vanguard in the era of Songun full of the will to display their disposition and stamina.
					
					 The festive atmosphere revved up when such songs as "Ongheya" and "The Nodul Riverside" were played.
					
					 Dancing parties ended with songs "Victory Will Be Won Generation after Generation" and "Joy of the People", showing the steadfast faith and will of the successors to carry forward the WPK's revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 Similar dancing parties took place in provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
 Nampho, October 10 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen held a meeting at Nampho Port on Friday, the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the statue of President Kim Il Sung and paid tribute to him.
					
					 Earlier to the meeting, they went round photos documenting the undying revolutionary feats the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu performed by strengthening the WPK into the invincible party.
					
					 The portraits of the smiling President and leader Kim Jong Il were seen on the front wall of the meeting venue.
					
					 Present at the meeting were captains and crewmen of Marshall- and Panama-flagged ships 
					
					 At the meeting speakers referred to the feats Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by building the WPK into the revolutionary party of Juche type strong in independence and strengthening it.
					
					 They expressed belief that the Korean people would build a thriving socialist nation and reunify the country without fail in the near future as they have always brought victories and glory under the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: 2014 Provincial Mass Sports Contest Closes
articles.content:
2014 Provincial Mass Sports Contest Closes 
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The 2014 provincial mass sports contest closed at the Kim Il Sung Stadium on Friday. It opened in Pyongyang on October 1 to celebrate the founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 There were the finals of junior women's football, women's basketball, men's volleyball, men's and women's 1 500m race, hurdle race, Korean wrestling and tug-of-war.
					
					 Among the spectators were Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Choe Ryong Hae and senior officials of the party and state, chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the Workers' Party of Korea, members of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, senior officials of relevant units, members of the cheer-leading squads of provinces (municipalities), working people, youth and students in the city.
					
					 Also among the spectators were players and coaches who participated in the 17th Asian Games and overseas Koreans.
					
					 At the end of the matches the results of the games were announced.
					
					 Pyongyang City came first, grabbing a trophy cup.
					
					 Kangwon and North Hamgyong provinces placed the second and third.
					
					 The contest offered an important occasion for raising the sports enthusiasm true to the WPK's plan for building a sports power and making sound and lively revolutionary spirit pervade the country making a drive of building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Sinpha Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Sinpha Revolutionary Site
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Sinpha Revolutionary Site in Kim Jong Suk County, Ryanggang Province in northern part of Korea, is associated with the activities of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero.
					 In the site there are the statue of Kim Jong Suk, woman commander of Mt. Paektu, and historic relics preserved in their original state.
					
					 During the anti-Japanese armed struggle, Kim Jong Suk conducted underground political activities in the Sinpha area, under the strategic plan of President Kim Il Sung, to arouse the people of different strata to the struggle for the country's liberation.
					
					 In June Juche 26 (1937) she formed a Sinpha party branch in the area and a Singalpha chapter of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland.
					
					 Thanks to her energetic activities, the foundation for the anti-Japanese armed struggle had been further strengthened in northern and central Korea.
					
					 Today Kim Jong Suk County has turned into an important base for education in revolutionary traditions under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Many people, including servicepersons and students, have visited the Sinpha Revolutionary Site since it was opened on October 10, 1974.

articles.title: WPK Shines with August Names of Peerless Great Men: Papers
articles.content:
WPK Shines with August Names of Peerless Great Men: Papers
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- No party in the world shines with the idea and august names of its founder and leaders down through generations as the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Papers Friday say this in editorials dedicated to the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 There were many politicians who organized and led parties but no one was as outstanding as President Kim Il Sung who gave a genuine origin to the building of a revolutionary party in his teens and led the cause of party building to victory for decades, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 As leader Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of the President as Kimilsungism and wisely led the cause of modeling the whole party on Kimilsungism, the WPK turned into the party of the leader and its leadership function and militant might steadily rose.
					
					 It turned into the revolutionary party in which the ideological system and leadership system of the leader have been firmly established, the mother party which forms a harmonious whole with the people and serves them and the invincible party with steel-like discipline and fighting capability. This is the proud appearance of the WPK which was strengthened under the care of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Today the WPK is giving fuller play to the might as the party of the leader as it is led by another peerless great man.
					
					 Respected Marshal Kim Jong Un is the supreme leader of our party and people and distinguished statesman in the present era whom all progressives look up to. Thanks to the tested leadership of the Marshal possessed of gifted ideological and theoretical wisdom, extraordinary political caliber and noble virtues, the revolutionary nature of the WPK has been more clearly highlighted and its militant might remarkably strengthened. He has consolidated the unity and cohesion of the party as firm as a rock in keeping with the requirements of the present period in carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche. These great feats remain shining.
					
					 Minju Joson says the WPK will record only victory and glory on its sacred flag forever under the leadership of Kim Jong Un who is most successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and steadily strengthening WPK into their party.

articles.title: Seminar of Youth for Reunification Held in Tokyo
articles.content:
Seminar of Youth for Reunification Held in Tokyo
 Tokyo, October 9 (KNS-KCNA) -- A seminar of youth for reunification took place in Tokyo on Oct. 6 to mark the 7th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					 Present there were officials of the Korean Youth League in Japan, the Union of Korean Students in Japan and the south Korean Youth League in Japan, officials concerned and Korean youth and students in Japan.
					
					 Speakers praised leader Kim Jong Il for providing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the reunification programmes common to the nation.
					
					 Korea's reunification is possible when the north-south joint declarations are implemented, they said.
					
					 They called upon young people to turn out in a nationwide movement for reunification by their concerted efforts to improve the north-south relations and open a new phase of Korea's reunification.
					
					 They also called upon the young people in the north, the south and abroad to kindle the torch of struggle for implementing the joint declarations and usher in the second June 15 era of reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Laos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Laos 
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Lao State Publishing House on October 6 brought out in booklet supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party". 
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), says that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 It also indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into the glorious Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's party.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Marked in Kyrgyzstan, India
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Marked in Kyrgyzstan, India
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Kyrgyzstan and India on Oct. 3 to celebrate the birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 Present at the seminars were personages of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party, the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan and the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India and masses. 
					
					 A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the Kyrgyz party, said the Korean people call the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed by leader Kim Jong Il a mother party. 
					
					 The Korean people have felt through their life experience that the WPK is the mother party responsible for their destiny and future, he added. 
					
					 Wipin Gupta, chairman of the Indian committee, said First Secretary Kim Jong Un is the great leader of the WPK which is called a mother party by the people. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Love for the people is the starting point of all the thinking and activities of HE Kim Jong Un and it is the supreme principle and goal of his politics. 
					
					 He always asks officials to prioritize the interests and conveniences of the people and hold them absolute, and work hard for the people. 
					
					 That is why all the Korean people, moved by his love, harden their will to remain true to his leadership. 
					
					 The WPK led by First Secretary Kim Jong Un will win only victories, enjoying absolute support and confidence by the popular masses as the mother party.

articles.title: WPK's Anniversary Marked in Indonesia
articles.content:
WPK's Anniversary Marked in Indonesia 
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Colorful events took place in Indonesia to celebrate the 69th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 The Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle held round-table talks under the theme "WPK and building of a thriving nation" and the Rabitra Bahtera Pratama Co. of Indonesia a seminar and two other companies film shows between September 30 and October 2. 
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "The Tower of the Juche Idea" and "Monument to Party Founding". 
					
					 The head of the External Relations Department of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle said that the WPK is demonstrating its might as a steel-strong party and an invincible party and this would be unthinkable without the party building exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and the history of leading the party by HE Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The building of a thriving nation is not far away in the DPRK as Marshal Kim Jong Un is leading the party, army and people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					 They included meetings in the Czech Republic and Germany and photo and book exhibition and film show in Romania on Oct. 4.
					
					 Displayed on the front wall of the exhibition hall were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting the party-building exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Works of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos showing the might of the ever-victorious WPK were also on show.
					
					 Screened at the film show was Korean film "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation".
					
					 Jaroslav Kafka, chairperson of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, said the WPK has firmly preserved its revolutionary principle and successfully advanced the socialist cause despite the ceaseless moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK, adding this is because the WPK has the Juche idea founded by the President as its guiding idea.
					
					 The representative of the Czechoslovak Youth Communists Union praised Kim Il Sung as the eternal leader of not only the Korean people but also other progressives in the world.
					
					 Torsten Schoevitz, chairman of the Communist Party of Germany, said Kim Jong Il is eternal general secretary of the WPK who strengthened it with his outstanding idea and leadership.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, praised Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for developing the WPK.

articles.title: WPK Praised by Political Figure of DR Congo
articles.content:
WPK Praised by Political Figure of DR Congo
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of DR Congo and chairman of the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, released a statement on Oct. 1 on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The world people are joining the Korean people in significantly celebrating the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK, the staff of the Korean revolution and the guide of progressive mankind, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 It was thanks to the great President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il that the WPK could lead the Korean revolution to victory without any failure and setback, make great contributions to developing the world revolution and fulfill its internationalist duty.
					
					 The WPK, guided by the Juche idea, is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, the great statesman who has inherited the inborn dispositions of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The leadership of Kim Jong Un over the party serves as the source of the invincible strength of the party and people of the DPRK, and progressive mankind is looking forward to the rosy future of the accomplishment of the cause of global independence as there is Kim Jong Un, a distinguished man.
					
					 The Korean people and world progressive are highly praising Kim Jong Un for his popular traits and political caliber and are firmly convinced that the WPK will win victory after victory as it is led by him.

articles.title: Figure of Regional Body Wishes Korean People Success in Their Struggle
articles.content:
Figure of Regional Body Wishes Korean People Success in Their Struggle
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The coordinating secretary of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization issued a statement on Oct. 1 in celebration of the 69th anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The statement said:
					
					 Korea was divided into the north and the south after the Second World War and the DPRK was reduced to ashes during the Korean War provoked by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung wisely led the WPK and the Korean people in their efforts for the postwar rehabilitation and construction.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il energetically steered the Korean people in their efforts to reunify the country.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is in the van of the struggle for national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, frustrating the vicious moves of the U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces.
					
					 The organization together with the world peace-loving people warmly congratulates the WPK on its 69th birthday.
					
					 We wish the Korean people greater success in their future endeavors.

articles.title: Portavoz del CRN exige a Park Geun-hye no envenenar el clima de mejoramiento de relaciones N-S
articles.content:
Portavoz del CRN exige a Park Geun-hye no envenenar el clima de mejoramiento de relaciones N-S
						
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- En el encuentro del dia 8 con el secretario general de ASEAN, la mandataria surcoreana Park Geun-hye volvio a cuestionar el "problema nuclear" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea pronunciando palabras aviesas como "conducta dual de provocacion y suavidad" y "renuncia de desarrollo nuclear".
					  Al respecto, el portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional (CRN) publico el dia 10 una declaracion que sigue:
					
					Los dichos de ella constituyen imperdonable provocacion politica contra la RPDC y acto grosero que envenena la dificilmente preparada corriente de mejoramiento de relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					  Para mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas, hace falta crear bien el ambiente propicio y lo mas importante esta en los esfuerzos conjuntos de ambas partes.
					
					  El Norte y el Sur ya acordaron celebrar el segundo contacto de alto nivel.
					
					  Ya antes de que ambas partes se reunan, Park Geun-hye pronuncia tales palabras faltando a la cortesia elemental a la contraparte de dialogo.
					
					  Aunque fuera presionada por su amo gringo, ella debe aprender primero a reconocer y respetar a la contraparte.
					
					  Los disparates que calumnian a la contraparte ofenden una a la otra parte y no resultan provechosos en nada.
					
					  El reciente acto verbal de Park demostro por si solo que aunque ella habla mucho sobre la "mejora de relaciones Norte-Sur" y la "reunificacion", no esta interesada en eso sino persigue elevar su popularidad.
					
					 Anteriormente, ella empeoraba las relaciones intercoreanas pronunciando palabras que ofenden a la RPDC a cualquier hora y en cualquier lugar.
					
					Park Geun-hye debe hablar con seriedad dandose cuenta de que puede perder la oportunidad de mejorar las empeoradas relaciones N-S.

articles.title: FDRP elogia en memorando hazanas de Generalisimos por reunificacion de patria
articles.content:
FDRP elogia en memorando hazanas de Generalisimos por reunificacion de patria
						
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 34o aniversario de la presentacion del Proyecto de la Fundacion de la Republica Federal Democratica de Coryo por el Presidente Kim Il Sung en el VI Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria (FDRP) publico el dia 10 un memorando para transmitir las hazanas de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu realizadas por la reunificacion de la patria.
					Desde el primer dia de la division nacional, el Presidente presento la reunificacion de la patria como la tarea mas importante de la nacion, mantuvo invariablemente la linea de una Corea y la de reunificacion e indico claramente el camino de reunificacion de la patria presentando el susodicho proyecto mas racional que refleja el deseo de todos los connacionales sobre la reunificacion y conviene a la situacion concreta de Corea.
					
					El presento ese proyecto el 10 de octubre del 69 (1980) de la Era Juche.
					
					Su contenido principal es fundar una republica confederativa en la que el Norte y el Sur, sobre la base del reconocimiento y tolerancia reciprocos de las ideologias y regimenes existentes, instituyan un gobierno unificado nacional con participacion igualitaria y, bajo la jurisdiccion de este gobierno, ejerzan autonomia regional con iguales facultades y obligaciones.
					
					En este proyecto se plantean los asuntos relacionados con la fundacion de un Estado reunificado incluyendo la formacion de un Estado federativo, los principios y los remedios, el caracter y la funcion de este Estado, el deber del gobierno reunificado y el regional y sus correlaciones.
					
					El mejor remedio para realizar cuanto antes la reunificacion es fundar un Estado reunificado mediante el sistema federal basado en una nacion, un Estado, dos regimenes y dos gobiernos.
					
					Tan pronto como fuera publicado, el proyecto fue aplaudido por todos los connacionales del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar y la sociedad internacional.
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung dirigio sabiamente la lucha por ponerlo en practica.
					
					En su obra publicada en abril de 1993 "Programa de diez puntos de la gran unidad pannacional para la reunificacion de la patria", volvio a exponer la idea de fundar un Estado reunificado pannacional que pueda representar a todos los miembros de la nacion de distintos partidos, fracciones y sectores dejando intactos dos regimenes y gobiernos existentes en el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					En el ultimo periodo de su vida, hizo ingentes esfuerzos fisicos y mentales por preparar el ambiente interior y exterior favorable al cumplimiento de la reunificacion por el sistema federal.
					
					El memorando recordo tambien las hazanas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien llamo a todos los coreanos al cumplimiento de la causa de reunificacion de la patria.
					
					En su obra fechada 4 de agosto del 1997 "Materialicemos de modo consecuente el legado del gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung, para la reunificacion de la Patria", el Dirigente formulo como Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria, el Programa de Diez Puntos de la Gran Unidad Pannacional y el Proyecto de la Fundacion de la Republica Federal Democratica de Coryo, las cuales sintetizan los principios fundamentales y remedios para lograr la reunificacion.
					
					Asi aclaro los problemas que se presentan en el cumplimiento del proyecto de reintegracion federativa.
					
					En 2000, en que se cumplio el 20o aniversario de la presentacion del proyecto de la fundacion de la Republica Federal Democratica de Coryo, el Dirigente preparo por primera vez en la historia de division nacional la Cumbre Norte y Sur, en la cual hizo publicar la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, hoja de ruta de nuevo siglo para la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Llamo energicamente a toda la nacion coreana a la lucha por ejecutar la citada Declaracion.
					
					Al preparar otra vez en esta capital en octubre de 2007 la historica Cumbre N-S, publico la "Declaracion para el Desarrollo de las Relaciones Norte-Sur, la Paz y la Prosperidad", programa de ejecucion de la anterior declaracion intercoreana.
					
					El documento subrayo que la causa de reunificacion acoge la nueva fase de viraje gracias a la destacada direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					En su mensaje del Ano Nuevo, el Mariscal declaro claramente los remedios de reunificacion y la posicion de principios de la RPDC que se esfuerza por lograr nuevo avance en el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria en pleno acato al legado del Presidente y el Dirigente, con motivo de cumplirse 20 anos desde cuando el Presidente dejo su ultima firma en el documento historico sobre la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Por ultimo, el memorando enfatizo que las autoridades del Sur de Corea deben respetar y esforzarse por implementar la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio en que ambas partes reconocieron que hay puntos comunes entre el proyecto federal de etapa baja de la parte Norte y el proyecto de union de la parte Sur y acordaron orientar la reunificacion en ese rumbo.
					
					Asi deben sumarse a la aspiracion de todos los coreanos a la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion pacifica.

articles.title: Cuadros rinden homenaje a Generalisimos por dia de fundacion del PTC
articles.content:
Cuadros rinden homenaje a Generalisimos por dia de fundacion del PTC
						
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 69o aniversario de la fundacion (10 de octubre) del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Hwang Pyong So y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, y los funcionarios de organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales visitaron el dia 10 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					Alli fue colocado un cesto de flores a nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Fue depositado el otro a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC, el Comite de Defensa Nacional, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC.
					
					Los participantes rindieron homenaje a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il ante sus estatuas de pie y en los salones de eternidad donde estan conservados sus cuerpos.
					
					Luego, pasaron revista a las salas de conservacion de ordenes recibidas por los Generalisimos, las otras de conservacion de carros, coche electrico, barco y vagones de tren usados por ellos hasta el ultimo periodo de sus vidas para las visitas de orientacion y viajes al extranjero.

articles.title: Cuadros de partido y Estado visitan Museo de Historia de Fundacion del Partido
articles.content:
Cuadros de partido y Estado visitan Museo de Historia de Fundacion del Partido
						
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 69o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado visitaron hoy el Museo de la Historia de la Fundacion del Partido.
					Alli estan conservadas las oficinas y la sala de recibo, usadas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung despues de la liberacion de la patria, y la sala de reuniones donde se realizaron muchas reuniones inclusive la III Reunion Ampliada del Comite Ejecutivo del Comite Central Organizativo del Partido Comunista de Corea del Norte.
					
					Tambien, hay el alojamiento en que estuvo el Presidente despues de regresar a la patria, una laguna y el Monumento a la Fundacion del Partido que transmite para siempre la causa de la construccion del partido.
					
					Los visitantes recorrieron los objetos historicos y revolucionarios y los datos historicos que hacen recordar las hazanas del Presidente.
					
					Recordaron aquellos dias de la historia escuchando las explicaciones sobre el hecho de que el Presidente dedico incasables esfuerzos por fundar el partido inmediatamente despues de la liberacion y por fortalecerlo como el estado mayor de la revolucion.
					
					Entre los visitantes figuraban Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros, el presidente de partido amigo y los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido y el poder, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales.
